attributes.action:
Cut final university tuition fees due for next term
AND cancel dissertations
attributes.additional_details: Online teaching quality is poor and access to learning resources are limited due to social distancing measures and the lockdown. We are not getting what we are paying for, nobody agreed to paying for an online taught degree. We are unable to complete our dissertations to a high standard due to limitations on research methods and lack of resources and access to university libraries. Continuing to study as normal in non-academic settings is detrimental to mental health and academic performance
attributes.background:
No tuition fees to be paid for the final instalment of academic fees/a refund to those who have paid in full

An alternative form of assessment as opposed to the traditional post-graduate dissertation

rejection.details:
Decisions on dissertations and coursework are a matter for individual institutions.

You might like to sign these petitions relating to fees

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302855
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300566
